title: Air quality permits (Title V, synthetic minor)
dataVerified: Facility name, owner, emission sources, limits, monitoring, air quality agency
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake air permits. Domain binding verifies EPA/state air quality. Clean Air Act compliance. Prevents air pollution violations. High fines ($37K-$93K per day violations).
